tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I used to dread dental visits after a harrowing root canal experience with a different dentist. 

Determined to avoid any more dental appointments, I endured months of increasing sensitivity and pain in my premolar teeth. Eventually, a sizable cavity emerged, signaling the urgent need for professional care.

Despite initial hesitation, I sought out Dr. Anupreet Kaur Choudhury in Kolkata, driven by her stellar reviews. On a Sunday, with heightened pain due to the cold weather, I discovered her clinic, impeccably clean and adhering to COVID protocols. Dr. Kaur's warm demeanor immediately eased my fears.

After explaining my dental woes, she conducted a thorough examination, revealing cavities and a misaligned wisdom tooth causing the pain. Despite my apprehensions from a past root canal, Dr. Kaur patiently addressed each query, explaining the necessary procedures and reassuring me. Encouraged by her confidence, I decided to proceed with a root canal.

To my surprise, the treatments were swift, spanning three sessions of 15-25 minutes each. Dr. Kaur, alongside Dr. Sumit and Dr. Gopal, exhibited expertise and care throughout, erasing my fears. The post-treatment phase was equally comforting, with no pain or discomfort, allowing me to resume normal eating habits.

In reflecting on this experience, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Kaur and her team to anyone seeking a reliable dentist. A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Anupreet Kaur Choudhury and her dedicated team for restoring my confidence in dental care.
reply_text: Thanks Sparsha for acknowledging and sharing your valuable feedback

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Whitening,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
I visited Dr. Anupreet Kaur a few days ago for a consultation and possible treatment for recurring issues I've had due to an ongoing dental procedure (somewhere else), including two decayed wisdom teeth one of which had impacted a molar tooth beside it.
She carefully listened with a keen ear and meticulously provided planned solutions to the issues, which were taken care of by her and experienced doctors of her team at Dentall. 
I experienced painless extraction of the two decayed wisdom teeth in one sitting(by Dr. Basu, maxillofacial surgeon, Dentall) and minimal pain thereafter. I also underwent RCT for a molar tooth and it was painless(other than the minimal pain which is expected during the treatment).
Both the extraction and Root Canal Treatment were done very professionally. Dr. Kaur eased me well into them, by explaining everything involved during and after the procedures. Staff at Dentall have also been very cooperative and helpful throughout the course of days the procedures happened, responding to any query after the procedures. I also underwent removal of dental brackets and scaling, which were both done very proficiently by Dr. Anupreet without any pain or discomfort. 
I must add she is an amazing person with immense experience in her field and her dealing with patients is extremely professional, rare in today's world and highly commendable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: I went to Dr. Choudhary for my wisdom tooth extraction. She is very efficient in her work. The most important thing is she made me understand every detail of my problem and the treatment that she is going to do. This made me more confident about the treatment. I was always very sceptical about tooth extraction as I have heard from people that it's very painful process, that is the reason I had delayed my treatment thinking that the pain in my teeth will go automatically with time. But to my surprise the way she extracted my tooth was so quick and completely painless. Even after returning home I never felt even a slightest pain in my teeth as if no extraction is done at all !! The bleeding was also very less during extraction. Overall I am very very satisfied with her treatment. This experience completely took  away all the fear that I had about visiting a dentist. THANK YOU SO MUCH MA'AM ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è....Last but not the least the clinic is also very good, they follow all Covid guidelines ( sanitization processes etc.) , it's clean and hygienic.

review: As there are many dentists nearby i was very confused, where to go for consultation. so while searching through practo i found Dr Anupreet who is having 21 years experience and have nearly 100% recommendation,  which create a confidence in me to visit to her. I took a appointment through practo which was very simple and easy. while i visited the clinic, i was quite impressed to see all the sanitary protocols they are following, hence i felt very safe to visit there. During consultation, she understood my problems and advised  me for RCT of my teeth and as i gave my  consent, she started the 1st sitting immediately. ** ******** ** * ****** ******* ******** she did the whole 4 sittings of RCT within a week without having any pain in my teeth. She is so smooth in doing the procedures and  while giving the injection, you will hardly feel any discomfort. She also helped me with post procedure care to be taken for my teeth. she advised me with a very good toothpaste and interdental brushes. I felt very happy for my decision to visit her. I want to thank her very much and surely practo which helped me always to find a good doctor whenever i was in need. Thanks.

review:
It is really good experience,I had first time visited Doctor Anupreet Ma'am at the time of lock down for my mother's teeth surgery . My mother have sugar ,so we did not do surgery at the time.But Dr Anupreet ma'am had properly prescribed my mother with maintain all covid guidelines.
Today when my mother's sugar in control,PP is 235 than ma'am has suggested for detail surgery ,we did accordingly and as per my mother's experience that,she hasn't feel any pain at the time of surgery.

Thanks Ma'am

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have been visited for my dental issue.I have issue with my wisdom teeth Dr initially advice for the RCT of wisdom teeth.***** ** ***** ****** **** *** ** **** another thing she said that cap will be fitted to your teeth after then she said on wisdom teeth cap cat be fitted.Prior to lockdown I have done the RCT and unable to visit for 3rd sitting.***** *** **** ***** ****** *** **** *** ** *** *** *** ****** ******Finally I need to remove both the wisdom teeth ***** ********* ** *** ** ************ ***** ****** *** loss of money and time.I am suggesting don‚Äôt go to her.* **** **** ******* ***** ** ******* *** *** ***** ** ****** *********** *** ***** ****** ** *** ***** *** *** **** **** *******
reply_text:
Dear Sir,
Kindly note that RCT can be done in wisdom teeth,at first we suggested for capping,but then later decided not to do capping as it won't be fitted properly due to lack of space and also no money has been charged for caps,and all doctors are Masters in Dental Surgery and your RCT too done by an endodontist. Moreover charges of RCT of wisdom teeth are higher, secondly nobody should be blamed for this lockdown,so condition of your teeth deteriorated when neither the clinic was open,nor could anyone move out in lockdown in India.
